verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:22
verses.text: What? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in? or despise ye the church of God, and shame them that have not? What shall I say to you? shall I praise you in this? I praise you not.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:23
verses.text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you, That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:24
verses.text: And when he had given thanks, he brake it, and said, Take, eat: this is my body, which is broken for you: this do in remembrance of me.
